author: Ivar Posthumus
comment: Great tool! Works really well and doesn't drain your battery. A new phone is always faster, which doesn't feel like a real upgrade. But this app makes my phone a device from the future! When I leave home and disconnect from my WiFi, all tasks are run to connect to my Bluetooth car, launches the right traffic apps. When I leave my car, disconnect Bluetooth, enable WiFi, disable screen rotation, etc. Great! Keep it up!

author: A Google User
comment: Have been using this app for 5+ years. At the beginning it was great, but slowly it has become obsolete. No major updates (new features) have been released for a long time. It is easy to use and the UI is great, but it lacks support of a lot of controls that other apps can manage (look at Automate for example.) The big disappointment here is the geo location feature, which has never worked for me. I paid for this application when it was the best out there; today I would put my money somewhere else.

author: J.L. Showers
comment: Sucks. Does anyone actually work on this thing anymore or what!? Get this fixed! Update - For whatever reason, it changes my "Display Timeout" to "after 72 hours of inactivity" instead of "30 seconds" when triggering the iHeartRadio App.  A year or two ago it was fantastic.  Now it does (or doesn't) do whatever it wants. It decides what triggers (and parts of triggers) it feels like triggering, or it changes part of them entirely, regardless of my settings.  Here's hoping it returns to its formerly awesome app soon.  In the event it is phone related (I've uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared cache everyway possible, and factory reset (😠) my device). I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 5 on Sprint.  Hopefully that will help.

author: Richard Martinez
comment: I needed something fairly simple: turn off WiFi when my tablet disconnects from my home network to save battery. It seemed to do it once, but then it wouldn't do it again the next day. The Automate app can do that pretty well, and has TONS more capabilities.

author: Adil Abdulla
comment: I used to use the app just fine previously and loved it's functionality. However, recently, I'm noticing the app doesn't allow me to play a sound when a task runs. I used to have this enabled so as to notify me when a task ran while the phone was in my pocket. Now when I try to add a sound to a task, the app gets stuck in a loop, asking me to add more triggers. Would appreciate this issue being looked at. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy S7 with Android 7.0 in Canada.

author: Edo de Roo
comment: Purchased this app, as it does real magic. Starts navigation and music when I step in my car, and when car-bluetooth disconnects it switches on my Wifi. And when Wifi connects, it will enable-AutoSync. And now it knows by date/time also if I navigate home or to work ;)  Try the free version, and support if you like it like me.

author: Robbie Lambert
comment: TL;DR- 1 STAR for zero support. Zero response from devs.  Sad to say, I have to stop recommending this app. I purchased it YEARS ago (2012, maybe?) and LOVED it. HOWEVER. The NUMBER. ONE. Item I use this for is to integrate with my calendar to silence during meetings, church, etc. Calendar event starts, phone mutes. Calendar ends- unmute. SIMPLE, right? I got a new phone (note 8). But only for certain calendars; I don't need it to mute for a lunch date, for example. I restored my triggers from the cloud. Slick. __But now it doesn't read individual calendars!!__ So I can silence ALL or silence NONE. Yeah, that don't work for me. I sent an email to the devs, but 4 days later and no response. 1 star until someone at least acknowledges that I sent them an email... or fixes the calendar functionality. On to IFTTT, I guess. :(

author: Altaf Patel
comment: Very buggy. When I turn-on wifi, it automatically runs wifi-off task which actually should be run to turn-off wifi when I disconnect from my home wifi. Also don't know why but Triggers not getting triggerred sometimes. For example, Wifi-On at 4:05 pm didn't trigger today... Sound to Silent at 12:30 also didn't work. Sound to Normal mode at 2:10pm too didn't work.... Is there any way to view log files so that can know root cause of the issue? Or is there any bug in the app?

author: A Google User
comment: Don't waste your time and money with this outdated application. Use Automate instead, it's supporting all android updated features.

author: Jamie Cooper
comment: Having problems where this app stops rubbing triggers after a while and I need to reopen the app. Shouldn't be a problem on a phone with 6gb of ram

reply.author: Coleridge Apps LLC
reply.content: That should not be the case.  Please send an email so I can get some more info.

author: Tom P.
comment: For Android 7 I had to remove app from battery optimization to work correctly. Love app. I use it to change screen brightness and start apps (Pandora and Waze) when I Bluetooth connect in car. Lower sounds/ringer when connected to work Wi-Fi. Louder when at home but quiet after 11pm.

reply.author: Coleridge Apps LLC
reply.content: If you're seeing this please send us an email.

author: Chris L
comment: Been using this for well over 3 yrs. Paid for the pro version. The geo fence option is great. Just got Note8 and thought it didn't work. Remembered that I had to run the Lock screen plugin

author: howard mhc
comment: After searching for a user friendly app to switch from SmartWatch to car Bluetooth in vain for over a year along comes this very well built simple and effective app. Well done!

author: Ryan Clark
comment: I used to love this thing but it stopped working about 6 months ago. Not sure if the latest versions of android prevent apps from making changes in the background now, but as of about 2/2017 it hasn't worked for me.

author: Deved Smith
comment: Abandoned by the developer. The app no longer responds to time of day, geo fencing, or bluetooth. Simply doesn't work anymore.

author: J.D. Brewster
comment: What makes a smart device smart.  I only just started using this, but I can easily see how much this can automate my phone, changing all kinds of settings and running daily tasks regularly without me having to remember, like switching on wifi when I'm home, or in a Cafe, or setting an alarm and changing volume at night.  It's all kinds of capable of turning your phone into your digital best friend.

author: Jeffrey Davis
comment: When I first used the app here it came as a joke. Part said SHAM for whatever reason but that's nuts! Come back a good time later, there's at least SOME starter allotments plus trigger detection from the developer's existing Agent app (sold separately). Can't say what I once did no more... Consider me surprised by what a second opinion can do. Only complaint now is the link for the shop goes to Amazon for some reason...

reply.author: Coleridge Apps LLC
reply.content: How is using an in app purchase in the Play Store a "financial risk"?   You can utilize all actions as well as NFC, Bluetooth, and Wifi triggers without paying for anything.  The unlock merely adds more triggers.

author: Mike Mogharreban
comment: After trying it out, very happy. After paying for the full version, hardly ever works as it did before. Crap

author: Ryan Krauter
comment: The only way I can get my Ford Sync 3 with Android auto, Moto z force, and hauwei watch to play nice. Works great!!

author: Brian C.
comment: It doesn't seem like it is always working.  A lot if my triggers are a combination of time and day of the week.  However, they don't seem to be running consistently, which I why I purcahsed this app.  I had a different app that was free, but not running consistently.  Please help

author: Jeffrey Hsu
comment: An excellent way to get into phone automation and only $3 to dive even further into advanced tasks. Excellent levels of customization for the beginner to the power user!

author: Mike Watrous
comment: Does not recognize "when charger connected" or "when charger disconnected" on OnePlus 5 phone. Have to trigger manually. Unusable like this on this phone.

author: Jason Don
comment: There's almost nothing that you can do without buying the paid version. So little in fact that you can't even try out the app to see if it can even do what you want it to do.

author: Sandor Tarnok
comment: This app startet poping up out of the blue, to install it from the market. Not interested. Why does it pop up 50 times a day. Virus?

author: Avinandan Roy
comment: If this app works only with automate, why is it not providing complete details about automate, or automate trigger task launcher. Doesn't even use the same name as automate

author: Andrew Gluck
comment: When I got into my car wanted to disconnect my SmartWatch so my phone would work. I did three different tasks one to disconnect the smartwatch, want to hook up the phone and one to rehook up the smartwatch. It worked great

author: Natasha Ho
comment: Work great. Needed something easy to use. This app also has a nicer look than other automating apps. Thank you!
Worst app ever please don't waste your time please don't download this app it cost equals 200 rupees the worst ever

author: A Titanium
comment: Having trouble with geofence  the Google map won't load when I attempt to create an action

author: A Google User
comment: Switching hotspot on with a BT condition stopped working after Oreo update (S8+)

author: Dacia James
comment: Restrictions do not work, such a time or day, etc

author: Megan Chan
comment: Still making use of this handy app, mostly to adjust volume. Is it possible to have a geofence restriction?

author: Shubham Samarth
comment: The app is great.  Please add the direct option to invert the task (if wanted) after creating new task. It will make easy to shuffle task. Rather than manually creating it.

author: Wladimir Jakimowicz
comment: I had the pro version on my Samsung G4. I upgradedy phone. Downloaded all the plugins, and it still asks me to upgrade. I'm using Android 7.   I agree with most of the reviews, nothing much has happened to this app in the past few years. It's time to look elsewhere.

author: Aldo Quiroz
comment: Purchased the app and still ask me to purchase it...I got scammed

author: James Bolfik
comment: Program is easy to set up, already thinking of ways to automate more functions. Have one set to connect to the car and launch my mileage program when I set it in the holder.

author: Tommy W
comment: It's easy to use but drains battery like crazy... I even paid for the premium features and now regrettably uninstalling it..
Can't create a task. Just loops asking me to add step 2 when I don't want a second step.

author: waleed abdelfattah
comment: This app it is very very complex and finaly it is not useful

author: Ed Nafziger
comment: Most automation apps I've tried fail to work while the screen is off. This one works. Samsung Galaxy S8.
